nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow and a chance of freezing rain. Cloudy. Low around 13, with temperatures rising to around 20 overnight. Southeast wind 10 to 16 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Freezing rain likely and a slight chance of sleet before 8am, then snow likely and freezing rain likely and a slight chance of sleet between 8am and 5pm. Cloudy. High near 28, with temperatures falling to around 26 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before midnight. Mostly cloudy. Low around -3, with temperatures rising to around 2 overnight. Wind chill values as low as -19. Northwest wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 2. Wind chill values as low as -22. Northwest wind 12 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Cloudy, with a low around -7. North wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Partly Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before noon. Partly sunny, with a high near 1. North wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around -14. East wind 5 to 9 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 21. South wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 11. Southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 32. Southwest wind around 9 mph.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 21. South wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 41. Southwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 21. West wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before noon, then a chance of rain and snow. Partly sunny, with a high near 35.
